title: Client always freezing when a game starts,then works again
body: Whenever I do something like spectate or play a game,when the loading screen of the game pops up,before the player names load,the client will freeze and it says it stopped responding.Then it loads and goes back to normal.I've only encountered this today for the first time.It's pretty annoying.

replies.body: Do you happen to be *Alt+Tabbing* during the load screen or clicking on the client before the champion boarders and portraits load up? Sometimes either of those actions will cause the client to temporarily stop responding because interactions are happening before the game's client has fully loaded as a process.

> [{quoted}](name=Targons Blade,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=MPIoTMhT,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2016-09-15T17:42:33.394+0000)
>
> Do you happen to be *Alt+Tabbing* during the load screen or clicking on the client before the champion boarders and portraits load up? Sometimes either of those actions will cause the client to temporarily stop responding because interactions are happening before the game's client has fully loaded as a process.

No,I whenever the game starts I stop doing anything and let the game load,during which it freezes.I'm aware of the alt+tab issue.Also,this is the first time a Rioter responded to me,so that's cool.:D

Well, I'm glad you're not experiencing this due to an *Alt+Tab.* ^.^

Given your symptoms, this may be a direct result of slow disk access or a problem with missing system permissions that delays the loading of League assets. I recommend working through the steps in our [permissions guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/204134104-Setting-up-your-Permissions) as a first step in resolving this.

Let me know if those steps caused any change.
